alert.note: Alert for Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 14 at 11:37PM MDT until March 15 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Highlands and Southern Twin Falls County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will occur between midnight and 6 AM MDT Wednesday as a cold front crosses the region. Rain will change to snow Wednesday morning, posing additional travel hazards.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands
